title: When a Muslim husband wants a second wife
itunes:title: When a Muslim husband wants a second wife
description: Join Megan Wyatt as she answers Wives of Jannah community member marriage related questions from her inbox. This episode addresses a wife whose husband has said he wants to get a second wife even though he pays little attention to her and their four children.
content:encoded: Join Megan Wyatt as she answers Wives of Jannah community member marriage related questions from her inbox. This episode addresses a wife whose husband has said he wants to get a second wife even though he pays little attention to her and their four children.
itunes:subtitle: Wives of Jannah Question and Answer Box Episode with Megan Wyatt
itunes:author: Megan Wyatt
